card_text: 2 Level 4 monsters$NThis card cannot attack. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; roll a six-sided die and apply the result.$N1: Halve your Life Points.$N2: Draw 1 card.$N3: Your opponent discards 1 card.$N4: Negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field until the end of this turn.$N5: Destroy 1 card on the field.$N6: Destroy this card.
